author: Caged- Bird🐦
text: Someone would said they get paid for it and we owe them sh*t. If that's how you feel this tweet is not for you👏👏👏

author: Caged- Bird🐦
text: Imagine if Black Coffee would trend because its his birthday and not because of something negative. Creatives put in work to entertain us, we can do the bare minimum to acknowledge and celebrate their efforts.

author: Caged- Bird🐦
text: Our celebrities have come forward and said they are depressed. But to me it looks like even the smallest of gestures create excitement if one is not in a good space

author: Caged- Bird🐦
text: Looking at how @Officialzola7 was all cheered up in that Bentley, I  realized it's small things that cheer up a person. I initially thought Mamkhize gifted him that car. I think instead of bullying these celebs all the time, @ChrisExcel102 should start more positive trends
